ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bards and Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: I m in a guild called the Sacred Brotherhood of Wolves on E ci and I believe we have 3 bards although one is a level 14 secondary and the other is a level 30
ygData.messageBody:
I'm in a guild called the "Sacred Brotherhood of Wolves" on E'ci and I
believe we have 3 bards although one is a level 14 secondary and the other
is a level 30 something primary who doesn't seem to play that often. I am
basically our guild's bard. I believe we have one high level enchanter and
one or two low level enchanters who are secondaries. Our guild is primarily
composed of Druids (surprise surprise). It's kind of nice to be in such
exclusive demand ;-)

-Faras
Bard of the 48th song, E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 10:33 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bards and Enchanters


Wow, didn't know Valeyardb was still around. Been a long time since we ran
into each other. There sure seem to be a heck of a lot more bards on E'ci
than on Sol Ro, the other server I play on semi-regularly.

Kit

I'm in Militia these days, and we have at least 4 high-level bards. Myself,

Guibu, Vasen, and Valeyardb.

>Anyone know if Aloro is still on this list? He used to post here quite a
>bit. He still posts on The Concert Hall a lot so I know he still plays.
>Same for John Kim (Kaearia on the Concert Hall).

As far as I know, both of those reprobates are still lurking around here
somewhere. I'll send you a line if I happen to spot one of them.

;)

Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
~Militia~
Fleet Footed Singin' Fool
